content:
TITLE: Initializing Metasploit Client in Rust
DESCRIPTION: Basic example of creating a Metasploit RPC client and retrieving the token. This demonstrates the core functionality of establishing a connection to the Metasploit RPC server with the required connection parameters.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parrothacker1/rust-metasploit/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: rust
CODE:
```
use metasploit::client::Client;
let client=Client::new("127.0.0.1",55552,"user","password",true);
print(client.gettoken());
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Rust-Metasploit Dependency in Cargo.toml
DESCRIPTION: Configuration for adding the rust-metasploit library as a dependency in a Rust project's Cargo.toml file. Specifies version 1.2.0 of the library.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parrothacker1/rust-metasploit/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: toml
CODE:
```
[dependencies]
rust-metasploit="1.2.0"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting up Metasploit RPC Server with msfrpcd
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the Metasploit RPC daemon (msfrpcd) with specified username, password, port, and IP address configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parrothacker1/rust-metasploit/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
msfrpcd -U <username> -P <password> -p <port> -a <IP Address>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Connecting to msfconsole RPC Server in Rust
DESCRIPTION: Example of creating a client connection to the Metasploit RPC server started from msfconsole, with SSL disabled. When starting the RPC server from console, SSL should be set to false.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parrothacker1/rust-metasploit/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: rust
CODE:
```
let client=Client::new("127.0.0.1",55552,"user","password",false);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Loading Metasploit RPC Server in msfconsole
DESCRIPTION: Alternative method to start the Metasploit RPC server from within the msfconsole interface, specifying username and password.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parrothacker1/rust-metasploit/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
msf6 > load msgrpc Pass=<password> Username=<username>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Example msfrpcd Configuration Command
DESCRIPTION: Specific example of starting msfrpcd with username 'user', password 'password', port 55552, and localhost IP address.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parrothacker1/rust-metasploit/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
msfrpcd -U user -P password -p 55552 -a 127.0.0.1
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Example msfconsole RPC Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Specific example of loading the msgrpc module in msfconsole with username 'user' and password 'password'.
SOURCE: https://github.com/parrothacker1/rust-metasploit/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
msf6 > load msgrpc Pass=password Username=user
```
